mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total FROM my_product p LEFT JOIN my_product_description pd ON (p.product_id = pd.product_id) LEFT JOIN my_product_to_store p2s ON (p.product_id = p2s.product_id) WHERE p.product_id not in (663,662) AND pd.language_id = #{language_id} AND p.status = '1' AND p.date_available <= NOW() AND (pd.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{q},'%') OR pd.tag LIKE CONCAT('%',#{q},'%') )

SELECT p.product_id, p.image, pd.name, p.price, (SELECT price FROM my_product_special ps WHERE ps.product_id = p.product_id AND ps.customer_group_id IN('0',#{customer_group_id}) AND ((ps.date_start = '0000-00-00' OR ps.date_start < NOW()) AND (ps.date_end = '0000-00-00' OR ps.date_end > NOW())) ORDER BY ps.priority ASC, ps.price ASC LIMIT 1) AS special FROM my_product p LEFT JOIN my_product_description pd ON (p.product_id = pd.product_id) WHERE p.product_id not in (663,662) AND pd.language_id = #{language_id} AND p.status = '1' AND p.date_available <= NOW() AND (pd.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{q},'%') OR pd.tag LIKE CONCAT('%',#{q},'%') ) GROUP BY p.product_id ORDER BY LCASE(pd.name) ASC
